channel.title: Make an item in the shop cost tickets?
channel.description: Hey, I have a server that takes tickets for every 1000M a player gets. I now have a shop with rares and stuff in it but I want the cost of the items to be in those 1B tickets, not in coins. Any idea on how I could do that? :) Thanks for reading/helping eveyone.

item.title: Make an item in the shop cost tickets?
item.dc:creator: @strucker Strucker
item.description:
@strucker wrote:

[quote=“Krajix, post:7, topic:478416”]That post does not answer the question.[/quote]Search for a tutorial related to the tokkul, and just change it to your id, is it that hard?

Read full topic

item.title: Make an item in the shop cost tickets?
item.dc:creator: @3lv3n_snip3r 3lv3n snip3r
item.description:
@3lv3n_snip3r wrote:

What do you mean that doesn’t answer the question? Yes it does. It clearly says to copy and paste the codes from the tokkul shop and change the values it uses. Meaning, change the item id to the one you want to use.

item.title: Make an item in the shop cost tickets?
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

Krajix:

Do you think you could show me how to do it through team viewer for like a min?

No, and so I don’t come off as a ‘dick’, I’ll list some reasons as to why not:

  1. There are multiple Tutorials on how to do this. There have been for ages now. You’re supposed to Search for your answer before you even create a Thread.

  2. I’m not allowed to use Remote Access. Even if I could, I still wouldn’t, because you don’t learn anything from having programmers perform tasks for you.

  3. This isn’t a spoon-feeding community.

  4. You must first make an attempt yourself. If you’re unsuccessful, then you post your problem here, and we’ll be more than willing to help.

Read full topic

item.source: Make an item in the shop cost tickets?

item.title: Make an item in the shop cost tickets?
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

Well, one way would be to add a Condition for your “Buy 1, Buy 5, Buy 10, X” Packets, stating that if the Shop I.D = NPC_SHOP; resort the currency to the I.D. of your Tickets.

Another way of doing this, would be to add a Condition to your Shops ‘Main’ Method, stating that if the bought Item = the I.D. of the Item you wish, that the Player must have the Tickets I.D. and the amount you wish.

The best, and most efficient way, would be to re-write your Shops Configuration file to support a slot for your Currency I.D. in accordance to the Shop I.D.

Read full topic
item.source: Make an item in the shop cost tickets?
